userToCurrentAdSelected holds the current campaign to be displayed to a given user for this nonce

constructor.details: functionSignatures should not be in bytes format. Example of a correct function signature argument: "mintNFT(address)"

params.integratingProtocol: The address of the contract whose functions will be routed through the integrator.

returns._0: The total cumulative ad revenue since integrator deployment.
The address of the current ad campaign.

integratorWithdraw(uint256).details: After UMA/Kleros implementation, this function can only be called after judgement is reached that the guidelines/rules have been followed

routeInteraction(bytes,bytes4,bytes).details: There is no 'require(success == true)' after protocol.call() because even if external call is unsuccessful, we can confirm that the user was served the ad and can be registered as such

params.functionParams: The parameter bytes to pass as call data to the function to be called.
params.functionSignature: The hashed bytes4 signature of the function to be called.
params.signature: The signed message from the frontend, confirming that the user viewed this campaign content in the metamask snap

returns._0: A boolean indicating the validity of the signature.

validateUserSignature(address,bytes).notice: Validates that a signature was made by a user and that it signed over the current campaign address assignd to that user.This is for verifying that an ad was served in the snap

userdoc.notice: This contract is for handling ad revenues for platforms integrating the Billboard protocol to their interaction flow
